question: Which of the following kings along with Chandragupta II defeated the Shaka satraps of Malwa and Kathiawar?
explanation: Prithvisena I who was the son of Rudrasena I, Spent most of his time in consolidating his kingdom. He formed an alliance with Chandragupta II, and together they defeated the Shaka satraps of Malwa and Kathiawar.
